The Lough is calling you home

Book Your Stay Explore Experiences

Ireland's First Marine Nature Reserve

Nestled on the shores of Lough Hyne, our cottage offers an unparalleled connection to one of Europe's most unique marine ecosystems, where rare species thrive in Ireland's warmest coastal waters.

A Scientific Wonder

Lough Hyne is a unique tidal lake that maintains constant warm temperatures due to its connection to the Atlantic through a narrow channel. This creates a micro-ecosystem where Mediterranean and tropical species flourish alongside native Irish marine life.

Protected marine sanctuary since 1981
Home to over 70 species of marine life
Warmest coastal waters in Ireland

Sustainable Accommodations

Our eco-designed cabins blend seamlessly with the natural landscape while providing modern comfort and stunning views of the marine reserve.

Modern Eco-Luxury

Our contemporary cabins are built using sustainable materials and renewable energy systems, offering comfort without compromising our environmental values.

Authentic Experiences

Immerse yourself in traditional Irish culture and wellness practices surrounded by the beauty of West Cork's pristine natural environment.

Wellness

Finnish Sauna Sessions

Experience traditional Finnish sauna culture in our wood-fired sauna overlooking the lough. Includes birch whisks and cooling area with lake views.

€70 1 hour session
Book Sauna Session
Monthly

Yoga Mini-Retreats

Join our monthly day-long yoga retreats combining meditation, breathwork, and mindful connection with nature in this sacred landscape.

€120 Full day retreat
Book Yoga Retreat
Traditional

Artisan Bread Making

Learn traditional Irish bread making techniques using our wood-fired oven. Create delicious sourdough using ancient grains and local ingredients.

€45 3 hour workshop
